# denoiseStrengthMaskTextureUsage

**Instance Property**

The minimal texture usage options that your app’s input denoise strength texture needs in order to support this denoiser scaler.

## Declaration

```swift
var denoiseStrengthMaskTextureUsage: MTLTextureUsage { get }
```
title: denoiseStrengthMaskTextureUsage
